description: Mobile techniques mitigated by System Partition Integrity, ATT&CK mitigation M1004 (v1.0)
name: System Partition Integrity (M1004)

techniques.comment: Android and iOS include system partition integrity mechanisms that could detect unauthorized modifications.
Android includes system partition integrity mechanisms that could detect unauthorized modifications.
Android Verified Boot can detect unauthorized modifications made to the system partition, which could lead to execution flow hijacking.(Citation: Android-VerifiedBoot)
Android Verified Boot can detect unauthorized modifications made to the system partition, which could lead to execution flow hijacking.(Citation: Android-VerifiedBoot)
System partition integrity mechanisms, such as Verified Boot, can detect the unauthorized modification of system files.
System partition integrity mechanisms, such as Verified Boot, can detect the unauthorized modification of system files.
Ensure Verified Boot is enabled on devices with that capability.
